abbreviation for Personal Independence Payment: in the UK , money that the government pays to people who need extra help because they have a disability (= an illness, injury, or condition that makes it difficult to do some things that most other people can do) : Whether people can get PIP depends on an assessment of their ability to carry out certain daily activities. Some people's PIP claims have been unsuccessful.
More examplesFewer examplesYou can get PIP whether you are working or not.PIP has a daily living component and a mobility component. You can make a new PIP claim by calling the Department for Work and Pensions.
